data.comment: The match is underway at Mandemakers Stadion.
Goal! Henk Veerman gives Heerenveen a 0-1 lead in Waalwijk.
In the minute 19, That's a fine assist from Jan Paul van Hecke.
Sieben Dewaele (Heerenveen) has been shown a straight red card by referee Christaan Bax.
Heerenveen's Henk Veerman has been booked in Waalwijk.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Christaan Bax has blown to start the second-half.
Ibrahim Dresevic is replacing Benjamin Nygren for Heerenveen at Mandemakers Stadion.
In the minute 50, Vurnon Anita for Waalwijk has been booked by Christaan Bax and receives a first yellow card.
The home team have replaced Paul Quasten with Thierry Lutonda. This is the first substitution made today by Fred Grim.
Lennerd Daneels is replacing Cyril Ngonge for the home team.
In the minute 77, Waalwijk make their third substitution with Vitalie Damascan replacing Ola John.
Goal! Waalwijk go level at 1-1 through Vitalie Damascan in Waalwijk.
Melle Meulensteen with an assist there.
In the minute 84, At Mandemakers Stadion, Lucas Woudenberg has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Christaan Bax blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Sherel Floranus (Heerenveen) has received a yellow card from Christaan Bax.
Heerenveen's Erwin Mulder has been booked in Waalwijk.
